p: To obtain the plasma, blood samples were collected at the time of decapitation of hens and were then centrifuged at 500× g for 15 min at 4 °C, and stored at −80 °C until further analysis. The concentrations of calcium, phosphorus and magnesium in plasma were measured using a hematology analyzer (Spotchem EZ SP-4430, ARKRAY. Inc., Kyoto, Japan).
